What do you think should be done with this war-strucken nation? Although in recent times there has been some level of peace, war is destined to break out again. 
 
 Should we continue with the three-president government?
 
 Should we break up the nation, give the Serbian regions to Serbia, and the Croat-Muslim region to Croatia?

Bosnia as a country?
 
 I dont think there is a real Bosnia. You have Bosnian Serbs, Bosnian Croats and Bosnian muslims, wheres the real Bosnians? 
 
 Theres no such thing as a real Bosnian person, only drifters who moved there over the years, Bosnia as a country is a joke, as is F.Y.R of macedonia, All fake countries, created during a time of paranoia during the cold war.
 
 As far as bosnia is concerned split it up, thats what the people there really want anyway.

What do you think should be done with this war-strucken nation? Although in recent times there has been some level of peace, war is destined to break out again. 
 
 Should we continue with the three-president government?
 
 Should we break up the nation, give the Serbian regions to Serbia, and the Croat-Muslim region to Croatia?

 
 
 Who is this "we"?

Thats a good point.
 
 Who is we? The west?
 
 Who do you think we is?

Who is this "we"?

 
 I agree, it is not part of the United States. You can commnet on their form of government, for sure, but suggesting you should get rid of it is something entirely different.
 
 However, it is also true of what another poster said re: Bosnia's composition. It is not a nation in any historical sense. It is a modern construct. With three hostile competing ethno-religious groups, it is amazing it's lasted so long.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Bosnia and Herzegovina
